alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:51PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County including Prescott Valley through 515 PM MST... At 450 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yavapai County Fairgrounds and Prescott Valley. This storm was moving very slowly toward the east. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prescott Valley, Dewey-humboldt, Yavapai County Fairgrounds and Prescott Valley Event Center. This includes the following highways... State Route 89A between mile markers 322 and 331. State Route 69 between mile markers 280 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
